comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
This photo is from the Royal Roost before it went full-time bebop. Notice the organ behind Taylor.
The organ-piano duo (Robert) Wyatt & (Billy) Taylor played here from January until early April, 1948.
("Celebrity Night Scores at Wells,” New York Age, January 24, 1948, 25. “Goings on about Town,” New Yorker,  April 17, 1948: 7).
